Reviews.Title: Serves Its Purpose
Reviews.Author: 808 Coug
Reviews.Content: Bought 5 of these to put up around the house.  Looks realistic enough to fool most people.  However, not sure what effect it will have in darkness, since it doesn't have a blinking red light.  I initially opted to get these because those with blinking lights required frequent changing of batteries & the areas that these were to be mounted presented a problem when changing batteries.  I gave it only 3 stars because of poor design by the manufacturer.  An electrical wire is mounted on the back of the camera but you have to use your imagination to determine what to do with it.  I decided to drill a small hole into the plastic mounting base, stick the wire through that hole, tie a knot on the open end so one couldn't pull it back out of the hole & then mounted it onto the wall.  Perhaps the manufacturer could have pre-drilled a hole or even supplied an instructional sheet with suggestions on mounting & placement of this wire to make it look realistic, even to the trained eye.

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: R. Basile
Reviews.Content: I also bought 3 of these to cover my carport/porch and driveway.  They look very realistic.  My only suggestion for improvement is something that draws attention to the camera, such as motion activated sound, movement or light. This would require changing batteries, so it's really a trade-off. But, without drawing attention to itself, the camera relies on an intruder seeing it. So, I also bought some signs and stickers.The other reviewer's comments about hanging it from the ceiling are unfounded. The "camera" housing has mounting holes on top and bottom, so you can choose to mount it standing up or hanging down.

Reviews.Title: Real & Easy
Reviews.Author: MD "MD"
Reviews.Content: Super easy to install and versatile mounting options.  They do look very real.  Yes, it is all plastic, but that is what I expected, especially for the price.  It was a great value and I will probably buy more of them.

Reviews.Title: Stopped theft.
Reviews.Author: Don "Don"
Reviews.Content: Believe it or not someone was stealing packages from my front porch.  I got one of these and put it in the window and put the sticker that comes with it by where the packages are left on the front porch and nothing has been stolen since.  I just hope the thief is not reading this review. :)

Reviews.Title: Good Theft Deterrent
Reviews.Author: Angry Wombat
Reviews.Content: Good quality for the price! It is plastic, and not exactly bullet-proof, but from a couple feet away looks plenty real. I like the loose cord attached to the camera, so you can run it underneath the trim of your house (or anything else) to look like a true hard-wired camera. Mounted easily and can be mounted in almost any position.

Reviews.Title: Worked well for me !
Reviews.Author: RAS
Reviews.Content: We put our home up for sale and moved 70 miles away so our home was vacant. People were stealing our real estate signs from the front yard and our neighbor was throwing dog poop on the front steps entering our home after a falling out we had(long story). Anyway i purchased 2 of these cameras and had both put in the house one aimed at the front door and one at the back. The signs didnt get thieved anymore and we had no more dog poop on our front porch so the camera did it's job. I had the cameras up for almost 4 months and never changed the batteries. Finally sold the home thank god.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor CEILING Mount for porch roof and eaves
Reviews.Author: Living in a CorporateDictatorship
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these as I needed a dummy cammera for my eaves in the back and front and for the porch ceiling.If you notice most of the others are meant to be wall or counter mounted. I bought two of the SVAT ISC200 and they can not be ceiling mounted despite the ad saying they can. Sure you can hang them upside down so that the housing that is supposed to protect from the rain is now on the bottom and this makes them look cheesy and fake. I ended up mounting the SVATs on the wall in the garage and using these 3 on the 3 uses above. They look real and for 9.99 each can't beat it. I was wishing that they had a blinking light but later thought about it. Would I really want to climb a ladder to change batteries for the under the eave installations? No so the lack of a red light is fine also. Most burglars are not going to notice a lack of a blinking light on an outdoor camera and even if they do not every camera has a blinking red light.

Reviews.Title: Camera for the lower I.Q. viewer
Reviews.Author: Daisy
Reviews.Content: Plastic but look real if placed 3-6 feet higher than normal vision.  I tucked the wire into building siding to look like it is really wired and placed under an overhang so weather would not fade the finish. Then to get it noticed as it does not have a blinking light (similar products with a blinking light people complain the battery life is too low) I put some silver reflective tape on the "hood" of the camera so it would be more noticed in low light situations.  Worth the few $'s if you are not installing at eye or close to eye level.

Reviews.Title: Toy-ish
Reviews.Author: le dude
Reviews.Content: This product might work well from about 40ft+ away from the intended use area. However, I would not recommend this product for use indoors. It has "video camera" written on the side that looks closer to a kid's toy than to a (fake) security camera. Take away the silly type on the side of the camera and it would be just fine.

Reviews.Title: Look so real
Reviews.Author: Janet Coffman
Reviews.Content: I installed these under my eaves.  They look like the real thing.  They should deter anyone from wanting to do bad.

Reviews.Title: Will It Deter Crooks?
Reviews.Author: Islander
Reviews.Content: Having experienced a break-in, this is the main question.  The camera seems "real" enough.  Also, as an added deterrent, I put the "beware of camera surveillance" self-adhesive 2"x3" decal (one included with each camera) at the front and back house windows where I installed my 2 cameras underneath the house eaves.  I believe the cameras will be more effective, and plan to supplement these decals, with larger yard signs warning of surveillance that are available on Amazon.  Time may tell, but judging the cameras' effectiveness will at best be an inexact science.  Note that the round screw knob (visible above the camera) which you turn and tighten to adjust the position of the camera (angle) is flimsy plastic that doesn't hold too well, and I was afraid to tighten it too much against the ball joint lest it break or become unusable (i.e. the plastic thread is stripped).  Also, if you have insufficient clearance or lack an adequate supporting surface between the top or side of the eave and where/how you want to screw the base of the camera and "hang" it, you may have to (like me) install the camera upside down (which may detract from its "authenticity").  What is shown in the product picture is the "ideal" installation position, which of course will not always be the situation you will face.  You will also need to consider placing it high enough or in a place where it is "tamper-proof" or "tamper-resistant".As mentioned in other reviews, there is just a cut off wire coming out of the back of the camera that you have to do "something" with to prevent it from just dangling in space, so I just drilled a small hole in the plastic base, inserted the wire through the front and knotted it from the back underneath the base where it is not visible.  It looks OK.  If this camera came with a blinking red light, like found on some of the other fake cameras (available and reviewed on Amazon) that I considered, it would be a real hassle trying to periodically replace the batteries, especially from the positions mine are in.  A blinking red light may make a camera more visible at night (for the deterrent benefit of crooks) but you would need to weigh that against how often you'd like to (remember to) get up on a ladder to change the batteries (this light will also be blinking during the day, when it is less or hardly visible and draining the battery).  Overall, for those, including me, who are unwilling or unable to go with a real home security system, I give this camera 4 stars for looking "real", its price, and relative ease of installation.  Minus one star for the issues I raised above.Nov. 2012 - adding a follow-up comment.  The "beware of camera surveillance" self-adhesive 2"x3" decal (one included with each camera) I put at the front and back house windows where I installed my 2 cameras underneath the house eaves started to fade in only about 2 months and are now totally faded, illegible and therefore useless.  Don't bother sticking these to any window, as it doesn't matter whether the stickers are in direct sunlight or not, they will fade, and you will wind up having to take/scrape them off.

Reviews.Title: Good and cheap
Reviews.Author: pamboy "pamboy"
Reviews.Content: Nobody ever thought this this is a fake camera. This thing looks like the real working camera. Good price for the camera and a good deterrent to robberies

Reviews.Title: Cheap way to keep thieves away!
Reviews.Author: ChristopherBJ
Reviews.Content: Looks very real! My husband wants to buy a second one. And he is very demanding when it comes to home security!

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Delmus Bradley
Reviews.Content: I bought it for a friend, it worked great.  The only thing is it has 3A batteries and they don't last that long before you have to change them out and put in new ones.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: jim jarvis
Reviews.Content: good product. as described. no problems installing. looks real untill you get too close. would buy again. thank you again.

Reviews.Title: Advertised Incorrectly
Reviews.Author: Cindy Martin "SonshineTN"
Reviews.Content: The description for this item says that it has a light and requires two batteries.  The picture even shows a light.  I took it all the way apart and there is no place for batteries, therefore no light.  Very disappointed!

Reviews.Title: It looks and mounts fine. The battery only lasts hours until the blinking light goes out.
Reviews.Author: martin tokatch
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for.The fake camera is only a deterent.It looks very realistic as long as the light keeps flashing but it would be unrealistic to change the battery daily.

Reviews.Title: Crap
Reviews.Author: royboy
Reviews.Content: Totally unrealistic looking, I sent it back. It's unconvincing as a dummy of the real thing - there are better ones out there.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Tools4me
Reviews.Content: This is a piece of junk and I am returning it.  The LED only worked for an hour and then stopped working.  It is made out of cheap plastic and of course made in China.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: angela morgan
Reviews.Content: I was not impressed with this product and returned it.  The return policy was easy. I really did appreciate that.

Reviews.Title: Was missing parts
Reviews.Author: Teressa K Owens
Reviews.Content: I had to return the thing because it didn'tcontain all the parts.  Won't buy this itemagain.  No apology or attempt to send spareparts was made.

Reviews.Title: A Complete Scam!!  Totally misrepresented...
Reviews.Author: James T. Looney "Sailors on SeaLoon"
Reviews.Content: Not as pictured in advert. Item does not have "CCD" written on it.  It does say VIDEO CAMERA.  Does not have blinking light / motion sensor as advertised.  I am returning it.  Amazon should not allow their merchants to do this misrepresentation.  Very frustrating.

Reviews.Title: horrible!
Reviews.Author: online shopper
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item last week. I was excited to see that it had arrived two days before the expected delivery date.  When i opened the box i was surprised to see how small it actually was. It looks like a toy. As i assembled them together, small silver chips of paint started falling.This does not look real and doesnt even have a blinking light.I dont recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Decent fake camera
Reviews.Author: yungjeezy
Reviews.Content: not too bad for a fake, i went into a store after buying this and saw there real version of this camera its really hard to tell this is fake very very minor details.... needs a trained eye to know

Reviews.Title: Lightweight plastic
Reviews.Author: Average Joe
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these fake cameras, and one had a broken base when I received it.  It is not a very robust construction and seems like it might break if you mounted it out in the wind, rain and snow.

Reviews.Title: Easy install
Reviews.Author: Buckeyefan "Buckeyefan"
Reviews.Content: Package arrived quickly.  They look good once installed.  The camera's don't say "VideoSecu" on the side, but rather in big font "COLOR VIDEO" which doesn't make them look as authentic as they could.  Simply pre-drill your holes, allow for enough room for the camera to move left and right, and mount.  Tuck the wire into a soffit hole, or pre-drill a hole into the wood trim on the house for the wire.  Get them up at least 8 feet in the air, but in sight of potential thieves.  I bought 4 for around the house and they look good.  Good cheap insurance.  They should weather well.

Reviews.Title: Looks real from a few feet away
Reviews.Author: E. Jones
Reviews.Content: This looks good but if a crook has done research the jig is up. Also watch out for the shipping charge. They say its weight is approx 6lbs, maybe on a planet with 12 times earths gravity. 1/2 lb at most. The fake camera weighs less than a Foscam F18918W.

Reviews.Title: Not bad....
Reviews.Author: Mac
Reviews.Content: Pretty cool little fake camera and not bad for the price. Easy to install and looks good. I will probably buy two more.

Reviews.Title: Not What the Description Stated - Not What I Expected
Reviews.Author: AMZN_FanBoi
Reviews.Content: This camera is supposed to have "VideoSecu" printed on the side -- The one I received did not. In fact, it had "VIDEO CAMERA" printed on the side. At the time of this writing, there has been two other reviewers who received the same WRONG item.VideoSecu is a legitimate maker of Video Security systems. A "dummy" version of their product SHOULD be more than sufficient in attempting to fool would-be thieves. Alas, this is NOT THAT PRODUCT.I commend the folks who try and "work around" the limitations of this product. But I do not believe that is necessary.Thanks to Amazon for an easy return policy.

Reviews.Title: JUNK JUNK JUNK JUNK
Reviews.Author: Dan "Top laid back"
Reviews.Content: and I am being kind. Comparing this to the Camera Tech with the blinking light which I ordered at the same time this 45 cent piece of mal formed plastic is only suitable for holding the end of a garbage bag down.One look screams fake, the pencil lead size "video cable" has no place to go, the connector is minute and there is no mounting hardware. No mounting hardware!!! Never have I bought any device that needed installation that did not come with hardware. Also the picture shows a lit LED no this unit has no electrical function, and speaking of picture as mentioned the mounting bracket shown is not the one you get.Surprised Amazon lists this.

Reviews.Title: Perfect 4 star rating....
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Well what can I say... for the money they are better then good.No blinky light.  But if you went to kindergarten you will understand that reading the description.(I didn't)They look real.  The neighbor seen them, and I think he is shivering in his boots.Don't mess with my home.  Im equipped with fakes.

Reviews.Title: battery compartment is missing one side
Reviews.Author: Lorelei Shark
Reviews.Content: No battery connection.... I have one spring and next to it one metal bump - and on the other side is black plastic - no connectors.  It says Made in China in large white letters on the base (which they don't show in their photos... they photoshopped it out.  It's a real fake - the lights don't even work.

Reviews.Title: Looks real, I think it stopped a theft
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: This fake camera looks real unless you get up close.  To increase realism, I tucked a bright cable (an old Ethernet cable) into the back and tucked it out of view on the roof. It makes it look like it is hardwired to something.One morning in December, I found that half of the christmas lights I had strung around a shrub were unstrung.  The lights were unplugged, and clearly someone had started to unravel the set.  They abandoned the christmas light theft in the middle of the criminal act.  My assumption is that the thieves noticed the blinking light of this fake security camera staring right at them and ran off.  So, this sub-ten dollar investment saved me from the loss of a ten dollar string of christmas lights.  Not counting the unknown number of breakins it has stopped since then, I am satisfied that it has already paid for itself.

Reviews.Title: Did not like them
Reviews.Author: Carlos Rios
Reviews.Content: I purchased 3 only 2 worked, the 3rd one shorted the 2 AAA batteries. I would try a different camera if I replaced them.

Reviews.Title: Working great, doing the trick, without the high cost...
Reviews.Author: Pinkie,      Idaho. "Sandra   W."
Reviews.Content: These are working out great. wonderful deterrent, haven't had any more problems.  Had Neighbors call me to ask what all the lights were about.  Had to call the EMS to let them know that they were not emergency signals...

Reviews.Title: Fake Security camera
Reviews.Author: Ryan Glenn
Reviews.Content: Item was delivered quickly. Camera was a different style than pictured and is black in color not gray. I will still use as is. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Boris
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these and both delivered broken. One of them took me a while and I repaired it. The other one, the arm is broken off from the fake camera.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Marcos S. Giménez Ch.
Reviews.Content: I received the product correctly, in good time, which is what I requested and filled my expectations, I am satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: Added some cable
Reviews.Author: James G.
Reviews.Content: These look good but I added a piece of cable with a connected on it to add some realism to it . The red LED light only flashes when it's dark out .

Reviews.Title: more crap from china
Reviews.Author: Mr. Timothy A. Burk
Reviews.Content: never did get it to light and wasted 2 batteries in the process. I installed it where I thought it would be obvious and not even family or friends noticed it.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for business
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for a friend that owns a business in a area where crime is increasing. While it does make for a deterrent to crime, it does have its draw backs. I got two of the cameras. One of the LED lights did not work at all. The other is fine. They do look real, but if you examine them up close you can tell they are fake, so i would recommend having them away from peoples reach where they can touch them or whatever.

Reviews.Title: Realistic and good value
Reviews.Author: Rev. Mark Johnson "Rev Mark Johnson"
Reviews.Content: Super realistic camera that protects from burglars.  Be sure to install the extra life batteries so you do not have to mess with them.  It flashes a red led and looks great!

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: WILLIAM OSBORNE
Reviews.Content: it looks so real! with the bright red light flashing and all.  People are fooled by it.  Will be ordering again.

Reviews.Title: Not as pictured, instructions wrong, but does the job
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: The camera delivered does not look anything like the camera in the Amazon photos.  Different base, no words on side, no wires.  I uploaded photos of the actual camera.  The camera takes 2 AAA batteries despite instructions indicating AA.  I will not be returning it as it will still perform as I need it ; however, the seller needs to update their photos.

Reviews.Title: Certainly not as advertised!
Reviews.Author: MARK  K. RAASCH
Reviews.Content: The camera received was black, not silver as in the ad. I was going to mount it on a crossbeam on my cathedral ceiling, but since the crossbeam is white in color, the black would not look the best. The item received also did not have the fake wire that adds to the realism of the camera. Lastly, the armature does not articulate/swivel for proper positioning as well as the camera featured in the add appears to. I would advise anyone thinking of ordering this item to reconsider and choose another option.

Reviews.Title: Looks like the real thing that's already installed.
Reviews.Author: Robin
Reviews.Content: Good value for the price. Just needed an extra to fill in a small area just for the look and it does.One note instructions says it requires 2 double A batteries but actually uses 2 triple A's.

Reviews.Title: Looks vs utility
Reviews.Author: Super dad
Reviews.Content: You have to see it for what it is: a dummy product. From far away, it may deter someone, so make sure you mount it accordingly high. However, the little motion sensor that triggers the red light to start flashing works ONLY in well lit surroundings. For me, that defeats the purpose, since it won't work at night, which is when it needs to! So be sure to post a sign to come rob you only during the sunny days.

Reviews.Title: Look like real cameras
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "svrider"
Reviews.Content: I can't complain, especially for the price. There's no point in adding batteries because today's security cameras don't have flashing lights or solid red lights. My only complaint is that the plastic base is a bit flimsy. You need to be careful adding screws. Orientation can be changed easily to top down or bottom up. The fake wire showing is a plus.

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: Jere L. Willsey
Reviews.Content: Looks realistic, The LED does flash but you have to be about 1 or 2 feet away to actuate it.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Pierre Cordova
Reviews.Content: the sensor only comes on when you are pretty close less than 5ft and by then one can tell the camera is plastic, it's a great item for me since I don't even care about the sensor light coming on. There were some shipping and handling problems given the fact that some of the (4) I ordered had a loose camera lens or a loose cable, all was simply adjusted and it worked great. Item was a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great fake security camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Jimmy Canora
Reviews.Content: It looks okay from afar and it comes with a 24 hour security camera surveillance "sticker" to put on your front door or window

Reviews.Title: Great props
Reviews.Author: Brent Duncan
Reviews.Content: Ordered a few of these for an indie film we're doing and couldn't be more happy.  Looks like the real deal, reads great on camera, and it's cheap!

Reviews.Title: could be better
Reviews.Author: doris
Reviews.Content: only detects movement within 2 feet of camera. could be much more sensitive to be of greater benefit and use

Reviews.Title: Looks OK but cheap as expected
Reviews.Author: T RAD
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these and both delivered broken.  One of them took me a while and I repaired it.  The other one, the arm is broken off from the fake camera.  Was a cheap purchase and sort of expected it so I'm not sending it back.  Hopefully once I glue the second one it will work.  We were just looking for something inexpensive that would look the part and these should do ok.  They actually look pretty real from a distance so that is why I gave it 2 stars.  But these are definitely on the cheap side.

Reviews.Title: camera review
Reviews.Author: Andrew Karmecy
Reviews.Content: Camera looks pretty real, especially form a distance. Up close it can tend to look a little bit faker, but even up close it still looks pretty good.  The base has 2 plastic parts holding it together, so I super glued those together, sanded where they connected, and then spray painted it with 2 coats. This way, it looks more real and less like plastic, since if it was real and had a metal base the metal base wouldnt consist of two metal peices linked together, it would just be one peice. It does have a blinking red light which makes it so much more realistic.

Reviews.Title: Looks Real but...
Reviews.Author: Timm J. Phillips "timmp"
Reviews.Content: This item really looks good, but the "motion activation" is really an electric eye in the old sense, that when the amount of light striking the sensor changes significantly, then the LED will flash. The driveway I have placed these on is a bright location, and it takes a dark large vehicle to make them flash. A teenager walking up the driveway to look for loose items in an unlocked car (I try and remember but may forget occasionally) does not activate the flashing LED. I would like a more sensitive one.

Reviews.Title: looks real
Reviews.Author: Made Media Photography
Reviews.Content: I have yet installed these but out of the packaging it looks very real. Great deterrent i think and very reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Fake Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Keith Weaver
Reviews.Content: Works like it is supposed to.  I have also noticed that there is less trash to pick up out of my yard.

Reviews.Title: does all it claimed
Reviews.Author: luckyDog
Reviews.Content: does all it claimed, we would buy again if needed, at present the equipment is in service and does all it claimed

Reviews.Title: who can tell
Reviews.Author: roush family
Reviews.Content: who can tell if their fake when i got them a person that i know who is a cop thought they look real and ask if i am recording him om camara and he could even tell they where fake so who can tell if a cop can`t tell just as long as nobody know`s

Reviews.Title: Great Looking From A Distance
Reviews.Author: Paul Yee
Reviews.Content: Don't let the picture fool you, this camera does not light up and I agree with the numerous reviews that say if it did, you'd be replacing batteries quite a bit and since I have it up high, maybe its for the better.  From a distance, this camera hopefully will do its intended job.  Great Amazon serive as usual though.

Reviews.Title: Different than pictured
Reviews.Author: P. Blake
Reviews.Content: I have had 4 of these for over one year. They have no battery or LED. I added my own flashing LED and rechargable batteries.

Reviews.Title: Not as advertise
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: The products I received don't look like the one shown on advertise photo, no red light. Otherwise it's just ok.

Reviews.Title: Realistic Appearance
Reviews.Author: Deek
Reviews.Content: I wanted to make people think that I had installed a security system because we were going to be out of town for 3 weeks or more.  My  Housesitter thought it was "Real" !  Since I returned home, others have also commented on the new "Camera", thinking it was real.  I would suggest this product to those in need of the idea of having a security system installed without the cost of a real installation.

Reviews.Title: Got what I paid for.
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: The redundant logo and script on the side make it a caricature of a security camera vs a device that mght fool a thief whohas even a bit of intelligence. A waste of hard earned money.

Reviews.Title: Dont buy its plastic material
Reviews.Author: Scorpio93p
Reviews.Content: I had bought this fake dummy security camera to see if it was worth buying but i was disappointed when i opened the box. the camera looks fake right off the bat. the material is all plastic. if it was made out of metal for the housing then it would be more believable. Keep looking for other ones and make sure it says made from metal not plastic so it can look more realistic and read its reviews to see if its worth buying or not.

Reviews.Title: Price is right
Reviews.Author: jim
Reviews.Content: Cheap deterent.  If it stops one incident it's well worth the money. Bought four to get the free shipping and have two of them installed at home and the other two at weekend get away.

Reviews.Title: Too small!
Reviews.Author: Ognat
Reviews.Content: This is a VERY small camera -- much smaller than CCTV cameras typically are and therefore I sent it back.  Wire is also not long enough to do anything with. :-(

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: jesus
Reviews.Content: The item arrived very quickly; it looks very realistic as advertised so you can really scare the burglars away. The red light works with batteries, it blinks like a real camera. Excellent purchase.

Reviews.Title: My Review
Reviews.Author: Keithmj "Noodj"
Reviews.Content: I bought four and installed all four, and they look real to me and if you are close enough to read "Video Camera" on the side then you are in my yard and shouldn't be there. If you don't like it just get some silver paint and paint over the letters.  I drilled a 1/8" hole in the mounting bracket, pushed in the wire and tied a knot to keep it from coming out. Easy to install and adjust. Most crooks will case the joint out for a couple of days so I know that they will know the cameras are there. Put some security light with motion sensors somewhere on your property so they'll come on when they come into your yard so they'll see the fake cameras, they won't know they are fake, they just have to take a chance if they don't really know. These can be hung under the eves of the house or on the wall or on top of something. I'm thinking of getting about four more to go along with the Swann Cameras I just purchased and I don't see why anyone would complain about these since they are nice fake cameras.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Outdoor Indoor Imitation Security Camera
Reviews.Author: PuterGeek
Reviews.Content: The cameras look very realistic from a distance, but the fact that it is labeled "Security Camera" on the side might give away the fact that it is a dummy if someone that is knowledgeable gets too close.  If it were labeled with just a brand, it might not be so obvious.  However, I was very happy with the shipping speed, the ease of installation, and the fact that the angle is adjustable making it very realistic looking.

Reviews.Title: Great Deterrant, looks good and is pocketbook safe!
Reviews.Author: Artemiderus
Reviews.Content: This product looks really quite good, it appears to have the same housing an actual camera would have. It came with two stickers as well, indicating the premises is under video surveillance. The stickers are a little silly looking and they don't stick on the inside of the window with out some work, because the adhesive is on the opposite side of the "surveillance" message, but in reality they look like what real stickers do, so I can't complain. They do come with a cable though, because they simulate a wired camera. So you need to do something with it or else it will clearly look fake. Luckily, an idea I got from another post worked great; drill a hole and tie it off inside. Also, it is probably best to keep this item high or in a place you can't get too close to, just in case someone wants to investigate it further. This was wisdom I got from another post, it also prevents people from messing with it or "testing" it. Overall great for the price. It might be nice to have some more stickers and one could easily supplement with a simple internal system that would catch anyone that didn't heed the camera warning.

Reviews.Title: Looks Really Real
Reviews.Author: GoodCustomer
Reviews.Content: I bought this at the request of my wife who thinks it will scare away boogers. I must say, it looks real. I have found a genuine working camera that is identical. They might be made of the same body. It is quite substantial for an intended fake. And the mounting is versatile enough to fit any situation. What else can you say about fake camera. It's job is to be a good fake, and that it it.

Reviews.Title: Great Fake
Reviews.Author: Robert Garner
Reviews.Content: Annoying cable coming from the back but it's not hard to do something with that. I mounted a big (12inch) 2.4ghz antenna onto the cord, it actually looks pretty good. It says "Video Camera" in huge letters on the side. It looks really fake if you don't just see it head on.

Reviews.Title: Jungle George
Reviews.Author: Jungle George
Reviews.Content: VideoSecu Outdoor Imitation Security Camera looks very real from 15-30 ft. away.My application is outside along with 6 more expensive cameras (that have red blinking lights & are a little larger) but are dummy models as well. I am satisfied with this model, especially with the cheaper price compared to the 25.00 ones.

Reviews.Title: Looks like real
Reviews.Author: Louis Gedo
Reviews.Content: This camera looks like a real camera....because it is, except that the guts are missing.... but who would ever know for sure after its installed.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: I really love these products. Due to a recent break in my home I thought It was a good investment to buy a couple of these for my home. They are really easy to install and look so real. I would say to put them as high as you can to prevent people from tampering with them. I feel a little more safer at home.

Reviews.Title: BABLAM! No one knew the difference.
Reviews.Author: Bigg Tee "mr_maximus"
Reviews.Content: We had a small biz going and relied on two of these fake cameras to help deter shoplifting. They worked like a charm. I didn't want to drop the real meal bill on functioning cameras, so I opted for some fakeys - and I believe they helped to deter the shopliffers. Here's the deal, though, if you look reealllllly hard, you can tell they are fake... but the average shoplifting customer isn't going to eyeball these cameras to make sure. These are a great deal as a "just in case" addition to your security.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Chris B.
Reviews.Content: Purchased 2 of these "cameras" and have had them about 5 days.  Put one outside and one inside (for guests that come over that I don't know ie - cable guys, etc.).  They look amazing and seem to do their job very well.  Construction is great, wish they were metal, but that's a small issue.  The plastic seems perfectly fine.  As another reviewer said, I drilled a hole in the base of the one that I installed outside my house to make it look more professional, but the one inside I drilled a small hole into the wall and pushed a few inches of the cord through to make it appear like I did it myself.  Everyone so far believes they're real, even under close inspection! Definitely will be ordering more!

Reviews.Title: NOT WORKING!
Reviews.Author: Yolanda Saez "YOLANDA SAEZ"
Reviews.Content: OK I HAVE PUT THE BATTERIES IN CAMERA BUT THE RED LIGHT DOES NOT STAY ON. IS THERE A CERTAIN BATTERY THAT NEEDS TO B PUT IN CAMERA TO KEEP LIGHT ON?IF NOT I WILL B RETURNING THE ITEMS..I NEED SOMETHING THAT WORKS.....

Reviews.Title: CHEAP CHEAP CHEAP
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: Motion sensor doesn't work unless you stand right in front of it.I guess that's what I get for buying a cheap plastic

Reviews.Title: FALSE ADVERTISEMENT WARNING!!!
Reviews.Author: Shane
Reviews.Content: DOESN'T SAY "VideoSecu" ON THE HOOD AS ADVERTISED!!! INSTEAD IT SAYS "VIDEO CAMERA" ON THE SIDES... PERSONALLY THAT MAKES IT LOOK KIND OF FAKE, SO I'M GOING TO TRY SANDING OFF THE "VIDEO CAMERA" AND HOPEFULLY IT LEAVES THE SILVER FINISH. I'M GOING TO CONNECT THE 16 GAGE WIRE WITH SPLICE CONNECTORS AND HEAT SHRINK WRAP AND RUN IT ALONG SOME CONDUIT (WITH ZIP TIES) AND INTO A SECURE ROOM TO MAKE IT APPEAR MORE REALISTIC... E

Reviews.Title: Great Dummy Camera with one Fatal Flaw
Reviews.Author: Coach Grooch
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to install in my class room in order to keep my students under control when a substitute is present in my stead.  I told them that I would be using my Apple ID to check in on them periodically and that they should behave just like any other day (kids will believe anything, heh heh!)I returned the next day to work to find that my substitute had left glowing reviews- "Best group of kids I've ever had," "Like little Angels," etc., etc.  Kudos, VideoSecu Fake Security Camera CCTV Home Surveillance Dummy IR Infrared Bullet Camera with Flashing Light!  I owe you big time.However, I do have one (MAJOR) complaint to levy- the camera does not record.  I have installed it in my wall as per the (simple and easy to read) instruction manual, but every time I try to check the tape I put into my un-plugged in VCR back at home, it is completely blank.  In fact, there's no video at all.  In fact, the VCR isn't attached to a TV.I understand that this camera is designed to trick people into thinking they're being watched... People like criminals, cads, clowns, kids, cretins, vulgarians, vandals, visigoths, ostrogoths, oafs, imbeciles, children, churls, buffoons, bozos, boobs, brutes, blockheads, peasants, peons, rubes, ruffians, maroons, morons, muckers, muttonheads, slackers, shirkers, swains, and nincompoops... But does that really mean it can't record, copy, and broadcast moving visual images?

Reviews.Title: Cheap camera
Reviews.Author: Construction guy "Construction Guy"
Reviews.Content: This camera looks good but is so cheaply put together that it won't work. It wasn't worth my time returning it.  Wouldn't recommend it to my worst enemy.

Reviews.Title: A bad purchase
Reviews.Author: R. Narimatsu
Reviews.Content: Not only the cameras looked like a plastic toy camera, but also both cameras where damaged on arrival and the flashing lights did not function.  I would not purchase this brand of camera again.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS
Reviews.Author: Sinan J.
Reviews.Content: Not working at alldont wast any moneyPLZ DO NOT BUYDO NOT BUY THISthis is just trash.

Reviews.Title: Confused and need info
Reviews.Author: Buyer123
Reviews.Content: Im not sure what to do with the wire, like why do  you put it or where does it go into? Do you have to drill a hole to put it in or what? Does it look real or fake? I don't like the "VIDEO CAMERA" written on the side of the camera that is what messes it all up but whatever its not a big deal. But I need something that looks like not a toy kind of thing. I did not buy this product yet and im not sure if i should.

Reviews.Title: Kind of disappointed...but it's cool still...
Reviews.Author: Abrupt
Reviews.Content: I seen the lights on the photos prior to purchasing this item and cord so naturally assumed it plugged in and lit up.When I got it, the cord was only a partial (as if literally cut off...no plug attached to plug it in)So instead of calling to return or complain/inquire, I wired it to an end and plugged it in.Lol.Blew out my outlet and cord as fast as I plugged it in. :/Silly.:/Well it apparently was meant to tuck in somewhere and will not light up. :(No biggies, I have remote IP cameras all over I just wanted a cheap real looking one at another angle outside w/out that big cost.It looks neat. It's cool. I wish in its description it had told it DOES NOT LIGHT UP OR PLUG IN , WILL COME WITH PARTIAL CORD.Lol.O well.

ProductInfo.Features:
Fake dummy IR camera easy to install with mounting bracket & screws
Increase your security at a fraction of the cost of real cameras
The inexpensive solution for security/theft problems with high imitation
Mix dummy & real cameras to increase your security value; Staff & thieves will never know it is a dummy
Built-in light sensor will turn on flash light at night automatically. A power switch can shut off flash light when you need
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Fake Security Camera CCTV Home Surveillance Dummy IR Infrared Bullet Camera with Flashing Light 1RE
